name: Liquid Entry
description:
liquid entry
Let's transform into slime, collect clean droplets and purify the polluted world

#2.5D #Adventure #Side-scrolling game_Platform #Story_Puzzle
Exploring through puzzles, the number of water droplets collected and users actions taken determine the endings.
Let's gather water droplets using the ability to transform into liquid.



A future where the world's water is polluted and almost no life can live...
An experimental body was created to solve this situation...

But he runs away...!



A boy who turns into slime.



Where will he end up heading?



People everywhere......what are they?

The ending changes only through your choice...!
